Outsource Valentine

14 Feb 2010 - JaapSuter.com

So it’s almost Valentine’s day, and you still don’t have any good ideas. As panic sets in, you do the obvious thing… procrastinate.

Then while surfing the web and cleaning up some old bookmarks, you stumble upon The Faces of Mechanical Turk and suddenly wonder; “What if I pay a bunch of complete strangers a single dollar for a…”

Well, just watch the video.
